SEARCH
Package src.util

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
src.util.Logger
public class Logger extends Object
A simple logger class with multiple logging levels for different occasions. Each logging level has an effect on the output in the form of a color change. The output will be shown in the format: [HH:mm:ss:SSS] [log number] [cause] LEVEL: message. INFO level messages are displayed in green, WARN level messages are displayed in orange, and ERROR level messages are displayed in red
Version:
1.0
Author:
devinlinux

    • log

      public static void log(Logger.Level level, String cause, String message)
      Method to log a message with the specified log level, cause, and message
      Parameters:
      level - The log level (INFO, WARN, ERROR).
      cause - The cause of the log message.
      message - The log message to be displayed.

    • info

      public static void info(String cause, String message)
      Logs an informational message with the specified cause and message. This method simply calls the log method with the INFO level.
      Parameters:
      cause - The cause of the log message.
      message - The log message to be displayed.

    • warn

      message - The log message to be displayed.
